text: Pyotr Yefimovich Todorovsky (26 August 1925 - 24 May 2013)Скончался режиссер Петр Тодоровский was a Ukrainian-Russian movie director, screenwriter and cinematographer of Jewish origin.Тодоровский Пётр Ефимович His son Valery Todorovsky is also a movie director. Todorovsky was born on 26 August 1925 in Bobrynets, Ukraine. He was raised in Odesa, Ukraine, then part of the Soviet Union. Todorovsky has one son, Valery Todorovsky. He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film in 1983. Todorovsky died on 24 May 2013 from a heart attack in a hospital in Moscow, Russia, aged 87.Film director Pyotr Todorovsky dies at 88 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Cinematographers Category:Jewish screenwriters Category:People from Odesa Category:Russian Jews Category:Russian movie directors Category:Russian writers Category:Soviet Jews Category:Soviet military personnel of World War II Category:Soviet screenwriters Category:Ukrainian Jews Category:Ukrainian writers
